desc: BLIXON FYFE IS A SOUTH AFRICAN RUN BUSINESS THAT PRODUCES CONTEMPORARY JUDAICA, LINEN NAPERY AND OTHER BEAUTIFUL PRODUCTS. OUR AIM IS TO CONSCIOUSLY DESIGN PRODUCTS AND SUPPORT LOCAL INDUSTRY TO PROVIDE SUSTAINABLE AND BEAUTIFUL ALTERNATIVES FOR A MORE ENVIRONMENTALLY FRIENDLY LIFESTYLE.

layout.text:
CLOTHING AND HOMEWARE CONSCIOUSLY CREATED
TO PROVIDE SUSTAINABLE AND BEAUTIFUL ALTERNATIVES
